documentation.text: An intentionally barebones balance mapping only supporting mint/burn/transfer

params.account: The account to get the balance of
params.currency: The currency to get the balance of

transfer(address,address,uint256).details: Will revert if the sender does not have enough balance

InsufficientBalance().notice: Thrown when user has insufficient Claims balance

InvalidAddress().notice: Thrown when transferring Claims to this address

Burn(address,address,uint256).notice: Emitted when burning `amount` of currency Claims from address

Mint(address,address,uint256).notice: Emitted when minting `amount` of currency Claims to address

Transfer(address,address,address,uint256.notice: Emitted when transferring `amount` of currency Claims

userdoc.notice: An intentionally barebones balance mapping only supporting mint/burn/transfer
